verses.text: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* ye \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w only|strong="H7535"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w families|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H0127"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*.
Shall \w two|strong="H8147"\w* walk \w together|strong="H3162"\w* \w except|strong="H0518"\w* \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w be|strong="H3162"\w* \w agreed|strong="H3259"\w*?

\w Will|strong="H0369"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* \w roar|strong="H7580"\w* \w in|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*, \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w prey|strong="H2964"\w*? \w will|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w lion’s|strong="H3715"\w* whelp \w cry|strong="H6963"\w* \w out|strong="H7580"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w den|strong="H4585"\w*, \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* \w nothing|strong="H0369"\w*?

\w Will|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w bird|strong="H6833"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w snare|strong="H4170"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w if|strong="H4170"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* fowler? \w Shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w snare|strong="H4170"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w before|strong="H4480"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* hath \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* somewhat?

\w Shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* \w sound|strong="H8628"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w afraid|strong="H2729"\w*? \w Shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, which \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*?

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w* doth \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w revealing|strong="H1540"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* \w secret|strong="H5475"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3069"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w roar|strong="H7580"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*? \w The|strong="H3069"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w*?

Publish \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* houses \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Azotus, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* houses \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Assemble|strong="H0622"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H8432"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* follies \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* thereof, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* suffer \w oppression|strong="H6217"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w inner|strong="H7130"\w* rooms thereof.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* right thing, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, storing \w up|strong="H0686"\w* iniquity, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* robberies \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* houses.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* tribulation, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* compassed \w about|strong="H5439"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* \w taken|strong="H3381"\w* \w away|strong="H4480"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* thy houses \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* spoiled.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w As|strong="H0834"\w* \w if|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* get \w out|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w lion’s|strong="H0738"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w legs|strong="H3767"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* tip \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*: \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w taken|strong="H5337"\w* \w out|strong="H3427"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* \w piece|strong="H0915"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* \w bed|strong="H4296"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w couch|strong="H4296"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Damascus.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* testify \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*:

\w That|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* begin \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*: \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w cut|strong="H1438"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w winter|strong="H2779"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w summer|strong="H7019"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w ivory|strong="H8127"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H0006"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.
